name: Kilo
key_features: Turns natural-language requests into code changes
Runs project tests and iterates on failures
Creates pull requests with summaries and citations
supported_models: GPT-4 and open-source large language models orchestrated by Kilo
pricing_model: Open-source; users provide API keys and pay for model usage
description: Kilo is an open-source VS Code extension that turns natural-language requests into code changes.
long_description: Developed by Kilo Labs, the extension plans code changes, edits files, runs tests, and opens pull requests. It's freely available on the VS Code Marketplace with one-click installation.
